short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take screenshots. Also works for full page and custom-size screenshots.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple screenshot extension for Chrome. Supports taking screenshots of the current window, of an entire page (scrolling) and of a custom area.
